Text: Building electric vehicle charging infrastructure is critical for the environment & will create good union jobs. PA is now eligible for $25M in new federal funding from the #BipartisanInfrastructureLaw to build our EV charging network. #PA17 https://t.co/10j0NVrn6i

Great to meet with @IrelandEmbUSA Ambassador @DanMulhall today. #PA17 is home to a large Irish-American community & I look forward to building on the strong bond between our countries. https://t.co/7KemNrgFwp

On #SaferInternetDay, I'm joining my colleague @RepSusanWild in calling on @YouTube to remove "How To Tie a Noose" videos. We need to do more to make the internet a safer place for young people. #PA17. Learn more here: https://t.co/djfqO1gq1E https://t.co/2EZh8GYgkt

PA has thousands of old, abandoned coal mines. PA is now eligible to receive $2444M from the #BipartisanInfrastructureLaw to reclaim our lands while creating jobs across the state & in #PA17. https://t.co/ua6ylOeYBl

Today the House passed the #AmericaCompetes Act – another win for western PA & #PA17. Federal dollars from this bill will flow here & create jobs by investing in American manufacturing & innovation. https://t.co/iBaXqFB5kr

The $1.2T #BipartisanInfrastructureLaw is a huge win for PA & for jobs. Read my latest #PA17 newsletter to learn more about the positive impact this legislation is already having on our region’s infrastructure & transportation systems. https://t.co/9Oab2EpJ7K https://t.co/8AyPEFDQ0n
#BlackHistoryMonth is a time for all of us to reflect upon & honor the countless contributions of Black Americans to our society. #PA17 https://t.co/88PLWxA5Bs

Today I announced that PA is eligible to receive $104M in federal funding from the #BipartisanInfrasturtureLaw to plug abandoned oil & gas wells which will help protect the environment from dangerous methane leaks. It’s also great news for jobs in #PA17. https://t.co/w8mlWpxdlm

The President came to Pittsburgh today to highlight the $1.2 trillion #BipartisanInfrastructureLaw & historic funding to fix our bridges. He also visited the bridge collapse site. Working together we’re going to rebuild this bridge & fix our broken infrastructure. https://t.co/OjnR7xn9Oj
Closely monitoring the bridge collapse in Pittsburgh. Please avoid the area so first responders can do their job. Praying for the safety of all. https://t.co/wBcVl8rlDP
Today on International #HolocaustRemembranceDay we honor the memory of the victims, survivors & their families. Together we must fight antisemitism & hatred everywhere. https://t.co/rxR2ehyFKo

This week the @HouseScience Committee passed my bipartisan bill H.R. 4270 to address abandoned oil & gas wells. This bill will improve our environment & create jobs in the energy sector. #PA17 https://t.co/LaJq9NEdxN

Today I announced $857.7 million in federal funding from the #BipartisanInfrasturtureLaw to completely rebuild the nearly 100 year old Montgomery Lock & Dam in #PA17. This is a huge win for jobs in W. PA. https://t.co/mgKVz31Lng https://t.co/lP3NoJimaB
Today, we can best honor the work & life of Dr. King by continuing the fight to protect & defend the sacred right to vote for all Americans. #MLKDay #PA17 https://t.co/Ih2CS2ak7i

PA has more than 3,000 bridges in desperate need of repair. The #BipartisanInfrastructureLaw invests more than $1.6B to fix PA bridges & will create thousands of construction jobs here in #PA17. https://t.co/Ios7CT2asM https://t.co/O6y2zZw01F

Every year, #PA17’s Aliquippa football plays & wins against much bigger schools, but now they’re being forced to move up to 5A. Enough is enough. I sent a letter to the PIAA urging them to reconsider. #LetsGoQuips https://t.co/LBWJOWZMfo https://t.co/W0JP8sOru1

One year ago, a few hours after our Capitol was invaded, I took to the House Floor to call out the lies that led to the violent insurrection & ensure that the peaceful transition of power in a free & fair election would not be obstructed.  https://t.co/DTBuXqF7Pi via @YouTube

Wishing a #HappyThanksgiving to everyone in #PA17. Special thanks to all the first responders & military personnel working today. https://t.co/rol4Z48Ikz

The #BuildBackBetter Act is an investment in real solutions for the challenges facing #PA17 families. It lowers health care costs, reduces the cost of child care, extends the #ChildTaxCredit & more. Learn what’s in the bill in my latest newsletter: https://t.co/hQdeAk0K2F

Today the House kept our promise & passed the #BuildBackBetter Act. This historic legislation will: 

✅Lower Rx prices
✅Extend the #ChildTaxCredit 
✅Invest in clean energy
✅Expand HCBS
✅Create good jobs

This is a huge win for #PA17 & all of Pennsylvania!

The application period for the @FEMA FY2021 Assistance to Firefighters Grant (AFG) Program is now open & will close on Friday, December 17 @ 5pm. 

Local organizations in #PA17 who can benefit from these grants should apply & call my office for assistance: https://t.co/JSDbDsCZSC

I’m at the White House today where the President just signed the $1.2 trillion bipartisan infrastructure bill into law.  Here’s what this historic investment means for Pennsylvania & #PA17 ⬇️ https://t.co/MVIHSDrWPn

The #BuildBackBetterAct will:
✅Lower Rx prices
✅Extend the #ChildTaxCredit 
✅Invest in clean energy
✅Expand HCBS
✅Create good jobs

It's time for Congress to pass this historic investment for #PA17 & the entire nation. Let's get it done!

On Veterans Day we honor all those who served, including #PA17 resident & Retired Marine Master Sergeant Craig Hodgkins. Learn more about Craig and his special friend Foxy in my Veterans Day newsletter: https://t.co/hvwxUxFe5A #VeteransDay https://t.co/ebua6pqk2m

The bipartisan infrastructure bill is a $1.2 trillion investment in America’s roads & bridges, energy & water systems, airports, transit, broadband & more, including $550 billion in new funding. You can learn more in my latest #PA17 newsletter: https://t.co/gO6rZcdPTN. https://t.co/5fmn6DKHxc
May everyone in #PA17 who is observing have a blessed & prosperous #Diwali. https://t.co/gHxVdQPdem
This month the @USMC turns 246! Thanks to my fellow Marines for stopping by today to celebrate the Corps’ legacy of service to our country. Semper Fi #PA17 https://t.co/C3WQR2gMHf

Our infrastructure challenges impact workers, businesses & communities. Today I joined @SenBlumenthal to introduce bicameral legislation to protect travelers & their families on Amtrak. Forced arbitration agreements unfairly limit consumer protections & this bill will restore the legal rights of Amtrak riders: https://t.co/gqG4lSOW4E
Today we honor the memory of the 11 lives that were taken three years ago in the attack on the @treeoflifepgh congregation. #StrongerThanHate https://t.co/LrhQntKnCQ
Today I joined my colleagues to introduce the #Secure2100 Act. We must expand Social Security for today’s seniors & protect it for future generations. #PA17 https://t.co/4YlD1MXC4Q

Today I introduced the Pay Down, Upskill Act to help reduce student debt loads while at the same time helping more people in #PA17 & across the nation access the education that leads to good jobs. Learn more about the legislation here: https://t.co/QsI4LRPu8P

The @usedgov has announced some much needed improvements to the Public Service Loan Forgiveness (PSLF) program, which helps public employees, teachers, firefighters, nurses & others in #PA17 earn forgiveness of their federal loans. Learn more here: https://t.co/0wnYFqSTVp

Read my latest newsletter to learn more about what I’ve been working on in Washington & here at home for #PA17, including info about legislation I introduced to lower the Medicare age to 60 to expand coverage for 23 million people: https://t.co/ysmA6QLZl7
I introduced the bipartisan SEED Act this week to ensure pre-K teachers have the tools they need to support kids in the classroom. #PA17 https://t.co/Taubi3ZqHO
For those in #PA17 who observe Yom Kippur, may your day of atonement be full of mercy, bliss & blessings. G’mar Tov

Today marks two decades since the September 11th attacks. As we remember all those that lost their lives that day, may it be a solemn reminder that we are one nation and at our best when we stand together. #NeverForget  #PA17 https://t.co/FVSinxCw8O

During its existence, the CCC planted more than 3 billion trees and constructed trails & shelters in more than 800 parks nationwide. These major infrastructure accomplishments still endure & continue to support our economy. This is an investment in jobs & the environment. (2/2)

The Civilian Conservation Corps was a work relief program that provided millions of jobs on environmental projects during the Great Depression. Today I introduced a bill to revitalize the CCC: https://t.co/uZCJM4mmkY #PA17 (1/2)
Here’s to a happy and healthy New Year! #ShanaTovah #PA17

I voted to #PassthePROAct to protect the rights of workers. I will continue to fight in Congress to improve the lives of workers to strengthen America’s middle class & rebuild our economy. #LaborDay #PA17

Today I led the introduction of a bill w/ more than 100 cosponsors to lower the Medicare age to 60. This will help millions of working Americans – like firefighters & nurses – who leave the workforce b/4 65 b/c of the grueling nature of their jobs. #PA17 https://t.co/5X7diMFWhj
The rain from Hurricane Ida has started to fall in #PA17. Learn what to do to stay safe, protect yourself & your family: https://t.co/2BlAHJbweS

Thanks to Chief Master Sergeant & Blackhawk Cougars Coach Lou Wolber & all of the Air Force Reservists from the 911th Airlift Wing for answering the call to help fellow service members and our allies. #PA17 https://t.co/UdejjvyeAs

We need to ensure that all Americans & our allies are safely evacuated from Afghanistan. This week I joined a bipartisan group of Members of Congress calling on the President to make sure we stay to finish the mission. #PA17 https://t.co/KL0RHdaUy9
Today I voted to pass #HR4 – the John Lewis Voting Rights Advancement Act. We must preserve our democracy & protect the right to vote for all Americans.  #PA17 #RestoreTheVote

An Army Special Forces veteran in #PA17 asked us to help his Afghan interpreter get to the U.S. Our constituent got this voicemail yesterday.

We’re working on several cases like this. Please contact my office if you know someone who needs to get out. We can help. https://t.co/vMCz0RMOZJ

Several volunteer fire departments in #PA17 have received @fema AFG grant awards totaling more the $400K. These funds will help to protect local communities & ensure our first responders can do their jobs. https://t.co/bDg1e6WCCh
Thanks to @VVAmerica Chapter 862 for inviting me to attend your annual picnic & for all the work you do supporting veterans across #PA17. https://t.co/Xzi64vfqW0

Today we dedicated the U.S. Post Office in Hookstown in #PA17 in honor of  Air Force Staff Sgt. Dylan Elchin who was killed by a roadside bomb while serving in Afghanistan. May we always remember Dylan's life and service. https://t.co/KNj7VhLj3k

Today I was joined by @RepMcKinley to introduce the bipartisan RE-POWER Act. This bill provides a smart investment in @ARCgov to support programs that will fuel job creation & economic opportunity in #PA17 & beyond. https://t.co/a8x57qMufD

The application period for qualified students in #PA17 seeking a nomination to one of the U.S. Service Academies is now open. Visit my website for more details on how to apply: https://t.co/dCBUqcQGs0

Visited @PhillyShipyard today to see first-hand the state-of-the-art commercial & military vessels built right here in PA that keep our nation safe & provide good paying jobs. #PA17 https://t.co/ujxUPvDBOq

The House just overwhelmingly passed the ALLIES Act with bipartisan support to ensure that the lives of those who served side by side with American troops in Afghanistan are protected. The Senate should move quickly to get this bill to the President’s desk. #TakeThemToo #PA17

W. Pa has resources not found anywhere else: steelmaking expertise, abundant natural gas & world-class researchers. Today we met w/ @SecGranholm & @ENERGY to discuss how we can lead the world in low-carbon steel. #PA17 https://t.co/h1xmPxd2ks https://t.co/OSxfqOY3wH

Today @PITairport  becomes the first airport in the world to be completely powered by a solar energy & natural gas microgrid, further evidence that W. PA is a leader in building the clean economy of the future. #PA17 https://t.co/EyiKmkUK2S

If you are not required to file tax returns but are eligible for the program you can use the free #IRS Non-Filer tool to register: https://t.co/8eLjWVyDwQ. If you have questions call my office (412-344-5583) for assistance. (3/3)

Starting this week, eligible families across #PA17 will begin receiving Child Tax Credit payments directly from the #IRS. If you filed a 2019 or 2020 tax return & meet eligibility requirements, you will automatically begin receiving monthly payments w/ no additional action. (2/3)

One of the most important aspects of the #AmericanRescuePlan Congress passed to help our economy recover from the #COVID19 pandemic is the expanded #ChildTaxCredit to help working families with children. (1/3)

Abandoned oil & gas wells are an environmental hazard across PA. Today I introduced a bipartisan bill to establish a federal program to research how to clean up these sites, which will create jobs & improve our environment. #PA17 https://t.co/TH6tFPKQQG

Happy Father’s Day to all the dads across #PA17.
Today, for the first time in our history, #Juneteenth is an official federal holiday.  I join with everyone in #PA17 & across the country in a day of celebration & remembrance.

Western PA is home to hundreds of bridges that are critical to our transportation system --far too many are in desperate need of repair. Today I introduced the bipartisan Support for Community Bridges Act to secure funding to fix these bridges. #PA17 https://t.co/OLBlgn1Z3G

America’s infrastructure is in desperate need of investment & we must step up to meet the challenge. The Invest in America Act will put people back to work & ensure long-term investment in #PA17 & across our region.  https://t.co/EfQZdp7ntQ

Summer is our most important construction season. Read more in my latest newsletter about a bipartisan infrastructure bill I recently introduced to create jobs & invest in our communities. I also announced the #PA17 U.S. Military Service Academy nominees: https://t.co/e44shEGeuf

We’ve asked people to sacrifice a lot this year for the sake of public health — jobs, businesses, wages and working hours, time with loved ones.
